workflow.name: Schedule interviews and send GPT-4 reminders with Google Calendar, Gmail, Slack and Recrutei
workflow.description:
## Overview: AI-Powered Interview Scheduling & Reminders

This workflow automates the end-to-end process of scheduling technical or behavioral interviews. It captures interview data via Webhook, creates a Google Calendar event with an integrated Google Meet link, generates a personalized, professional reminder email using AI (GPT-4.1-mini), and automatically sends it via Gmail exactly 24 hours before the interview.

## Setup Instructions

To implement this workflow, follow these steps:

1. **Webhook:** Copy the Production URL and configure it in your Recrutei ATS to send interview JSON data.
2. **Google Calendar:** Connect your account. The node is pre-configured to generate a "hangoutsMeet" conference link.
3. **OpenAI:** Requires a valid API Key. The AI acts as a Recruitment Assistant to draft a professional email body.
4. **Wait Node:** Currently set to "1 day before" the interview. You can adjust this timing based on your communication policy.
5. **Gmail:** Connect your recruiter or company account to perform the final delivery.
6. **Recrutei's API:** Inserts your Recrutei token in the Authorization header.

workflow.name: Interview Scheduler with AI Reminders & Slack Approval

nodes.name: Create the interview and invites the candidate

values.content:
You are going to receive information about a video conference about a job interview from Recrutei ATS that was dated in google calendar and created a meet link.

Your job is to, with all that information, create a message to remind the candidate about the interview, the e-mail will be sent 1 day before the actual day of the conference

The e-mail must be in EN-US, with a professional tone.

Only output the content of the e-mail, nothing more. Do not output a subject, only the content, without title, only the text necessary

Do not sign the message.

nodes.name: Wait until 1 day before the interview
nodes.notes: You can personalize as you need

parameters.dateTime: ={{ DateTime.fromISO($('Create the interview and invites the candidate').item.json.start.dateTime).minus({ days: 1 }).toISO() }}

nodes.name: Send the message to the candidate
nodes.notes: The source node of the data is specified to prevent errors.

parameters.subject: ={{ $('Create the interview and invites the candidate').item.json.summary }}

parameters.content:
## Overview: AI-Powered Interview Scheduling & Reminders

This workflow automates the end-to-end process of scheduling technical or behavioral interviews. It captures interview data via Webhook, creates a Google Calendar event with an integrated Google Meet link, generates a personalized, professional reminder email using AI (GPT-4.1-mini), and automatically sends it via Gmail exactly 24 hours before the interview.

## Setup Instructions

To implement this workflow, follow these steps:

1. **Webhook:** Copy the Production URL and configure it in your Recrutei ATS to send interview JSON data.
2. **Google Calendar:** Connect your account. The node is pre-configured to generate a "hangoutsMeet" conference link.
3. **OpenAI:** Requires a valid API Key. The AI acts as a Recruitment Assistant to draft a professional email body.
4. **Wait Node:** Currently set to "1 day before" the interview. You can adjust this timing based on your communication policy.
5. **Gmail:** Connect your recruiter or company account to perform the final delivery.
6. **Recrutei's API:** Inserts your Recrutei token in the Authorization header

## Ingestion & Scheduling
The workflow triggers when candidate and vacancy details are received. A specialized Code node formats the date/time into ISO strings, ensuring Google Calendar creates the event at the correct time and generates the required video conference URL.

## AI-Driven Copywriting
Instead of using rigid templates, the OpenAI node receives specific meeting details (candidate name, vacancy, and Meet link). It drafts a professional, humanized reminder email in English, tailoring the tone for a high-quality candidate experience.

## Smart Delivery
To maximize attendance, the workflow enters a "Wait" state. It calculates the optimal time to send the reminder (24 hours before the session) and then automatically triggers the Gmail node to send the AI-generated content. Then, it register in the observations on the ATS.

parameters.name: description
parameters.value:
=Candidate interview already set on Google Meet:
{{ $('Create the interview and invites the candidate').item.json.conferenceData.entryPoints[0].uri }}

parameters.name: description
parameters.value: =Candidate was approved to proceed to the next fase!

nodes.name: Selecting pipe stage id
nodes.notes: You must personalize this as you need

parameters.message:
=Dear {{ $('Webhook').item.json.candidate.name }},

Thank you very much for your interest in the {{ $('Webhook').item.json.vacancy }} position and for taking the time to participate in our selection process.

After careful consideration, we regret to inform you that we will not be moving forward with your application at this time. Although your profile shows strong qualities, we have decided to proceed with candidates whose experience more closely matches our current needs for this role.

We wish you every success in your professional journey and thank you again for your interest in our company.

Kind regards
parameters.subject: ={{ $('Webhook').item.json.vacancy }}

parameters.message: =The candidate {{ $('Webhook').item.json.candidate.name }} was approved and can proceed to the next fase?

parameters.content:
## Approving/Declining candidate
After the interview, it sends a message of approval/decline in a chosen channel in Slack

## Moving the candidate to the last pipe stage
Using the Recrutei's API, it adds an observation in the candidate informing the decision, it gets the vacancy to separate the pipe_stage_id of the last pipe stage, and then moves the candidate to the last stage

## Reproving candidate
It sends a reproval e-mail to the candidate and then creates an observation in the candidate at the ATS informing the decision

content.text:
Dear John Doe,

This is a friendly reminder about your upcoming interview for the position of Senior Python Developer. The interview is scheduled for September 10, 2025, at 7:50 PM (GMT-3).

Please join the interview via the following Google Meet link at the scheduled time: https://meet.google.com/rfn-zhot-qgh

We recommend that you test your equipment and internet connection in advance to ensure a smooth experience.

We look forward to speaking with you.

Best regards.

main.node: Wait until 1 day before the interview
Send the message to the candidate
Create the interview and invites the candidate
Send the message to the candidate

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
